TopicTitle: Searching for mods similar to Firespitter

Articles.Content: Just what the title says, I want to see you reply with some mods that are similar to Firespitter (i.e with propellers and cockpits) regardless of being on 0.90, 0.25, or any older than that. Thanks!!
Kerbal Aircraft Expansion is pretty good, and someone out there has an AN-2 cockpit (the KN-2 if you're searching). I also know of at least one other prop plane mod but the name escapes me.
RetroFuture is another good one, but like KAX, the Firespitter plugin is a dependency.
